entity.description: Mapping of the primary associated objects between which the relationship role is valid.

attributes.name: modifiedon
attributes.description: Date and time when the relationship role map record was last modified.

attributes.name: createdon
attributes.description: Date and time when the relationship role map was created.

attributes.name: relationshiprolemapid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the relationship role map.

attributes.name: createdby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the relationship role map.

attributes.name: modifiedby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the relationship role map.

attributes.name: associateobjecttypecode
attributes.description: Type of the associated entity in the relationship role mapping.

constrainedList.name: relationshiprolemap_associateobjecttypecode
constrainedList.description: Type of the associated entity in the relationship role mapping.

attributes.name: organizationid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the organization with which the relationship role map is associated.

attributes.name: relationshiproleid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the relationship role. This relationship role is only valid in a relationship between an entity of type specified in the primaryobjecttypecode property and an entity of type specified in the associateobjecttypecode property.

attributes.name: primaryobjecttypecode
attributes.description: Type of the primary entity in the relationship role mapping.

constrainedList.name: relationshiprolemap_primaryobjecttypecode
constrainedList.description: Type of the primary entity in the relationship role mapping.

attributes.name: createdonbehalfby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the relationshiprolemap.

attributes.name: modifiedonbehalfby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the relationshiprolemap.
